Posts.Content: Jul 25, 2011 02:39PM taniak wrote: My PS explained to me that the mechanism of Latisse was to extend the growth cycle of lashes - once they started growing it just kept them in the "on" position.  Since hair doesn't grow during chemo, he thought it wouldn't work and suggested I wait till I finish chemo.  hmmm. My oncology nurse suggested I look at Neulash and Nuveaubrow. Same idea, but no prescription needed and it lacks the darkening of the skin possible side effect.  May be the same thing in a different bottle, but I like that they have something specifically for brows.
Posts.Title: Lattise DUIRING chemo? CorinneM1 J-Bug
